title: CNBC Daily Open: Markets brace for impact of U.S.-Iran conflict as shockwaves begin to spread
summary_full: A prolonged closure of the Strait of Hormuz, a critical transit route for global crude, could lead to a 1970s-style energy shock.
summary_public: A prolonged closure of the Strait of Hormuz, a critical transit route for global crude, could lead to a 1970s-style energy shock.
